name: Nike, Inc.
summary: Nike, Inc. is the worldâ€™s largest supplier of athletic shoes, apparel, and sports equipment, headquartered in Beaverton, Oregon. Founded in 1964 by Bill Bowerman and Phil Knight, Nike is renowned for its innovative products, global brand presence, and iconic endorsements with top athletes. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker NKE and consistently ranks among the top U.S. corporations by revenue.
